tripadvisor.description: A pure reproduction of the Buenos Aires main page on TripAdvisor. The main goal was to put into practice frontend techniques that we learnt (DOM, Responsive, Flexbox, etc) but also to implement a small database for a login/signup usage (able to send an email confirmation on signup)

tellmemore.description: Full-stack project inspired by TypeForm. It is a form generator which allows to make friendly and editable forms, to fill them in and to visualize and administrate replies. This project was part of a technical test. Therefore the GitHub repository is private and the website access is password restricted. However, access can be given submitting request in contact field.

yuka.description: A pure replication of the Yuka mobile app. It allows to scan for products barcode to save them and to know about their nutrient data. Theses data are provided by the public OpenFoodFacts database.

airbnb.description: A functional and stylish replication of the Airbnb mobile app. There is a home screen showing all the rooms offers, an authentication portal (signin & signup) and an individual view for each room. Finally, the "Around me" mode allows to find rooms offers around according your current location.

escapegame-scraping.description: The goal was to scrap data from the escapegame.fr website. This was part of an exercise in Le Reacteur Bootcamp. The program is able to collect data from a webpage which gathers every escape-game rooms located in France categorized by city. Once data is collected, it generates a json per cities containing every rooms data.

marvel.description: Website which allows you to explore Marvel Comics API. All Characters and Comics are gathered and you can signup in order to select your favorites ones.

portfolio-nextjs.description: My personal portfolio which allows you to see all my projects and know a bit more about me

portfolio-gatsby.description: This project was part of an exercise during Le Reacteur Rocket Training. A project that took me half a day. This site was the very first version of my personal portfolio. Working on this website made me understand the great value of SSG (using Gatsby) in terms of performance and also for SEO. Each project page is statically generated on build.

vinted.description: A beautiful replication of the Vinted's Website. Including a fully styled and functional Home page, an authentication form, a dynamic offer page and a mocking payment process with Stripe

deliveroo.description: A realistic replication of the Deliveroo's Website. It is a single page listing dishes and a dynamic cart. This was part of a React exercise during Le Reacteur Bootcamp

about.0: Hi there! My name is Anthony and I'm a full-stack JS Junior Developer looking for a new job opportunity.
about.1: Since my early age, I've always been fascinated by Internet. I spent most of my time on my computer playing or simply surfing on the net. Later, I started to be interested in computer science and development. I did couple of projects such as a password manager software written in Visual Basic and plenty other projects using an Arduino dev board. After being graduated of a Master in Computer Science, I leant software development using LabVIEW. I made couple of programs designed to process data measurements and testings for climatic test chambers.
about.2: In 2020, my curiosity led me to begin a Coding Bootcamp of 25 weeks long to study Web & Mobile App Development with Le Reacteur. This made me realise at once the power and the complexity of Internet. However, thanks to a top quality teaching staff and many efforts and hours coding, the challenge has been made accessible and I got certified !
about.3: Today I'm definitely ready to make my career switch to Web & Mobile App Developer. I want to make a technical and a concrete contribution helping a company to grow. I also want to work together with a team, sharing skills, tasks, advices and a bunch of nerd jokes.
